title: Renaissance St. Louis Airport Recognized With "Supplier of the Year" and "Silver Spoon" Awards at MPI's Annual Awards Banquet
text:
SOURCE: Renaissance St. Louis Airport Hotel July 16, 2015 16:15 ET Renaissance St. Louis Airport Recognized With "Supplier of the Year" and "Silver Spoon" Awards at MPI's Annual Awards Banquet 
ST. LOUIS, MO--(Marketwired - Jul 16, 2015) - Renaissance St. Louis Airport Hotel was honored with two prominent industry awards: "2015 Supplier of the Year Award" and the "2015 Silver Spoon Award" from the St. Louis Chapter of Meeting Professionals International . Renaissance St. Louis Airport was recognized with the 2015 award winners, voted on by the entire MPI St. Louis Membership, at MPI's Annual Awards Banquet in June 2015. 
Supplier Member of the Year Jamie Gaddy, Director of Catering Description: Awarded to a Supplier member who has impacted MPI St. Louis throughout the year and has allowed the Chapter to better meet the needs of its members. This member inspires others, contributes to the continued enhancements of the meeting profession, creates new initiatives or acts as a catalyst to bring about exceptional results in the industry. Nominees will be considered for professional experience, MPI-St. Louis involvement, industry service and civic activities. 
Nomination: Jamie currently serves on the Membership Success Committee and is active in our chapter. She stepped up and has assisted in heading the team in planning the MPI Awards celebration. Additionally she supports the chapter through her position at Renaissance. Year after year, the Renaissance St. Louis Airport has come through for our chapter, whether it's been holding a monthly meeting, trivia, or EduCon. They constantly strive to outdo themselves each year and their generosity is unending. 
The MPI-St. Louis Silver Spoon Renaissance St. Louis Airport Hotel Description: Awarded to the member organization/company who has contributed generously by providing a high quality experience and outstanding support by hosting an MPI-St. Louis monthly meeting, special event, or sponsorship which contributed to the overall impact of the chapter's membership activities. This award highlights the company's dedication services and contributions to the continued enhancement of our chapter. The organization/company also demonstrates ongoing support to the industry. 
Nomination: The Renaissance St. Louis Airport Hotel showed great support in February by hosting 2 large events in one month! It was a great venue for our events with top notch staff. With their support, the chapter was able to make a profit from our fundraising event which helped to pay the overall expenses throughout the year. 
Renaissance St. Louis Airport Hotel offers luxury, comfort and connectivity to the finest in St. Louis attractions with 374 guest rooms and 19 suites, as well as 37,000 sq. ft. of meeting space. The hotel is just minutes away from popular attractions like the Saint Louis Arch, while corporate travelers enjoy our St. Louis business hotel's amenities & proximity to downtown and the Lambert-St. Louis International Airport. Please visit www.renaissancehotels.com/stlsa for more information. Renaissance St. Louis Airport Hotel is managed by Schulte Hospitality Group. 
Schulte Hospitality Group (SHG) is a full service hospitality company specializing in full service hospitality management and consulting services. With over 46 hotels throughout the United States, Schulte Hospitality has become one of the fastest growing hotel management companies of its kind. The company manages Full Service as well as select and limited service hotels and resorts under various brands including Marriott, Hilton and Intercontinental Hotels Group (IHG).
